question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Simplipal Biosphere Reserve?
1) It is situated in Orissa.
2) The biosphere reserve has the largest zone of Sal in all of India.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Simplipal Biosphere Reserve is a national park and a tiger reserve in the Mayurbhanj district in the Indian state of Odisha. It is the 7th largest national park in India. Simplipal biosphere reserve has the largest zone of Sal in all of India.
